description: The weather has cooled down, but the rum keeps tasting better. The taste of this refreshing cocktail will have you feeling like summer is just around the corner!
name: Black Widow Martini

recipeInstructions.name: Add black food color to black rum. Combine black rum, Crème de Cacao, and ice in a shaker until the drink becomes frothy (about 30 seconds).
recipeInstructions.text: Add black food color to black rum. Combine black rum, Crème de Cacao, and ice in a shaker until the drink becomes frothy (about 30 seconds).

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into a glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish a black umbrella on top of your black widow!
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into a glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish a black umbrella on top of your black widow!
